snippet: To help protect dissidents using video to tell their stories in countries with repressive government regimes, YouTube made available a new tool allowing people to obscure faces within videos uploaded onto its platform. Read more »
abstract: To help protect dissidents using video to tell their stories in countries with repressive government regimes, YouTube made available a new tool allowing people to obscure faces within videos uploaded onto its platform. Read more »

headline.main: YouTube Offers a Way to Blur Faces
